title: Magic Water Circuit + Dinner Show
description: See colored and illuminated fountains light up a Lima park with tickets to experience the Magic Water Circuit. It‚Äôs a chance to see the impressive series of towering fountains at their very best. Instead of just heading back to your hotel, make an evening of it by booking this combination tour‚Äîafter the fountains comes a buffet dinner accompanied by traditional dancing from three Peruvian regions.
all_descriptions: See colored and illuminated fountains light up a Lima park with tickets to experience the Magic Water Circuit. It‚Äôs a chance to see the impressive series of towering fountains at their very best. Instead of just heading back to your hotel, make an evening of it by booking this combination tour‚Äîafter the fountains comes a buffet dinner accompanied by traditional dancing from three Peruvian regions.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Circuito Magico Del Agua, Jr. Madre de Dios Parque de la Reserva, Lima 15046 PeruWe start our magical night by picking up each traveler from their hotel or airbnb.

First of all, you will visit El Parque de la Reserva, a place that invites you to escape from the noisy sounds of the city and immerses those who visit it in an atmosphere of peace. We will appreciate its beautiful neoclassical style fountains that reach unimaginable structures.

This site is also known as Parque de las Aguas and is located in the Cercado de Lima, in Peru, inside we will visit its 13 fountains controlled from a computer, one of which has a jet that reaches 80 meters high, It was built in 1929, in 1980 it was declared a Monumental Urban Environment and designed by the French architect Claude Sahut.

During the day, the space is majestic, but at night its scenery becomes a fairy tale that leads you to live in a world of illusion. Music, color and the game of images come together to put together a show that leaves Lime√±os and tourists amazed.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:La Candelaria, Av. Bolognesi 292 Barranco, Lima 15063 PeruAfter the tour of the Magic Water Circuit, we will head to the Candelaria Restaurant to enjoy an exquisite dinner and an unforgettable cultural show.

Dinner: The restaurant offers a wide variety of traditional Peruvian dishes, representing the rich cuisine of the coast, highlands, and jungle. You will be able to taste a selection of dishes that will allow you to experience the authentic flavors of Peruvian cuisine.

Traditional Dance Show: While enjoying your dinner, you will witness a magical performance of traditional dances from Peru. The show includes:

- Dance of Scissors (Danza de Tijeras): An acrobatic and ceremonial dance originating from the highlands.
- Marinera Norte√±a: An elegant dance from the northern coast of Peru.
- Other Traditional Dances: Representing various regions of the country.

Return to Hotels
At the end of the show and dinner, we will board our private transportation to take all participants back to their respective hotels.Duration: 2 hours

reviews.title: Magic water and dinner tour
reviews.text: We had a great time the water show was an experience and the dinner show was pure fun and exciter, Roxana was out guide and she made sure everything went smoothly, very fun personality I had the most fun and laughter with her, I‚Äôd relive that tour especially the dinner. Thanks Roxana!!!!!!

reviews.title: Must see!
reviews.text: We had a private tour with Roxanne. She showed us all around the park and made sure we had a good spot for the water show. I was nervous to go by myself and daughter so having Roxanne made me feel safe and secure.

reviews.title: Super recommended!
reviews.text: Excellent all the equipment! Both the coordination, the driver and especially the guide!!! Pamela knew a lot and was always very willing

reviews.title: A fantastic night
reviews.text: The Magic Water Circuit show was fantastic. It saw fountain shows in Vegas and Barcelona but this one was very unique with video stories projected on the fountains. The tour guide was good. He took us to see almost everywhere in the park where there were so many things to see. He told us the history of the park. He gave good tips on recording the show.The dinner show was also good, although the horse demonstration was cancelled because the original restaurant closed and we changed to  another one where there were only dancing show. The food was good and the dancing show was fantastic. The dancers demonstrated 6 dances from different parts of Peru. After their performance, the dancers invited the travelers to dance and have photos taken  with them.

reviews.title: Wonderful evening in Lima.
reviews.text: Spectacular evening. The water show was amazing. The dinner show after the Magic Water Circuit was phenomenal. The tour guide was interactive and informative all evening make the experience enjoyable.

reviews.title: A beautiful night
reviews.text: Fun night! The water fountains are amazing and its nice having a local to talk to while walking around all the fountains. The dinner show was canceled for me but they took mw to a small restaurant in Barranco and I ate anticuchos, picarrones, and drank a pisco sour. It was a beautiful night.
